amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to training and resources for first responders responding to hazardous materials incidents on railroads.

vote.text: Amendment SA 643 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 643 proposed by Senator Sanders for Senator Heitkamp. (consideration: CR 3/26/2015 S2014-2022; text: CR 3/26/2015 S2019) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to training and resources for first responders responding to hazardous materials incidents on railroads.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 643 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 643 proposed by Senator Sanders for Senator Heitkamp.
